name: Beans Parkour! 1.3 Alpha Release ! ! ! !
description:
Beans Parkour 3D

What is it?

Beans Parkour 3D is a 3D Capsule Parkour Experience with a lot of stage

(Game in Prototype Stage)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS  MINIMUM:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32 bit or above
  • Processor: Intel Core2 duo E8300 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX / AMD Radeon RX Vega 5 (Ryzen 4000 Mobile)
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
RECOMMENDED
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit or above
  • Processor: Intel I5 760 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti / AMD Radeon R9 Fury X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
